thread.section_title: Ramtown Carpet One Floor & Home Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ramtown Carpet One Floor & Home | www.ramtownfloors.com
thread.title: Karen Doe
thread.title_full: Ramtown Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Karen Doe

author: Karen Doe
title: Karen Doe
text: From picking out all of the great choices with the staff, to Tommy who is great at measuring and customer service, and finally the 5 installers that came on time , were very polite , very careful and were like machines installing an entire house with moving furniture , ripping up old carpet , installing the new carpet, then putting everything back where it belonged. I was amazed and to say the least very impressed. I totally recommend this place of business.
